DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine non-inferiority seroconversion compare safety tolerability ChimeriVaxTM-JE JE-VAX respective homologous virus strain completion vaccination course .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study Two Japanese Encephalitis Vaccines ChimeriVax™-JE JE-VAX
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 18 Subjects good general health . Females must negative pregnancy test use adequate form contraception History vaccination/infection JE Yellow fever flaviviruses History residence/travel flavivirus endemic region History anaphylaxis/serious adverse reaction Administration vaccine within 30 day study treatment period Clinically significant physical exam/medical history/lab abnormality Pregnancy Excessive alcohol/drug abuse Hypersensitivity constituent JEVAX® Blood transfusion/treatment blood product within 6months study study treatment period Known/suspected immunodeficiency Compromised blood brain barrier Employees Clinical Research Organization ( CRO ) /study site staff Any condition would exclude subject .
